page.title: 06Dairy farm
page.content: Mr.Hardey is a livestock farmer.He breeds dairy cows on his farm.His cows are milked by machines which fit over the teats and suck out the milk.His milking times are 6.00 am and 4.45 pm.Mr.Hardy has 114 acres of land to graze his cows on.He has{90 cattle} in his herd.He has {one }helper on his farm.He first started farming in{1935 .The reason for him wanting to work on a farm was because it was a family tradition.Now he has been farming for 50 years.Every day after milking he takes the milk and puts it in a machine.This stirs it up and heats it the heat kills the germs.The milk stays in the machine until the tanker comes.To take it away.
